p:
We consider an individual j. The infection status I
j indicates whether individual j was infected by MAYV and/or CHIKV. The ensemble of all possible infection statuses is I = {(1,0), (0,1), (0,0), (1,1)} where the first and second element denotes whether an individual was infected by MAYV and CHIKV, respectively. We denote
